summary: The 'Financing Our Energy Future Act' (S. 510) amends the Internal Revenue Code to expand the publicly traded partnership structure to various energy projects. This includes extending it to green energy generation, energy storage, transportation fuels like hydrogen and renewable biomass, and facilities capturing carbon oxides. The bill primarily aims to incentivize investments in renewable energy and related technologies, promoting a shift towards cleaner energy sources and potentially reducing greenhouse gas emissions. The changes made by the bill would apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2025.
